reviews.title: Nice value
reviews.text: If you want three stars or higher this is not the place for you - but if you want a clean room, friendly staff, nice price, and a good location then stay.

This is the first review written under the new ownership that took over June first. My wife and I stayed the last week in June and found Big Sky Lodge (not Motel) to be an ideal location for our excursions into that part of South Dakota. The rooms are very clean as is the building. The breakfast is enjoyable and filling for con't style.
reviews.title: feels like beeing home....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This year my husband, my big dog an me visited the big sky lodge for three times. The new owners Alicia and Jay welcomed us allways very friendly. They renew everything in the lodge and so the rooms are very clean and absolutly nice. All rooms have a fridge, a large TV, a microwave and coffee maker. Also there is a barbecue for the guests. You can sit in the hot tub and enjoy the fantastic view all over Rapid City.
reviews.title: not pet friendly
Watch Out!
reviews.text: Alicia and Jay now offer a delicious breakfast. They offer cereals, fresh fruits, toast, eggs, coffee, milk... its perfect.

reviews.title: great motel
reviews.text: We really loved it to stay here and enjoy the lodge with all the advantages - our dog is welcome and can move free all over the place. The lodge is near (5 minutes) to the center of Rapid City - but it is so quiet here.
